info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of customers.
info.title: Party Customers APIs

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

consentTypes.description: Conset Type for which the consent is given.The pre-defined consent types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

consentType.description: Conset Type for which the consent is given.The pre-defined consent types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

travelNotifications.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country, normally the SWIFT code of the country.

endDate.description: The date an agreement or contract ceases - the opposite of start date

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

contactDetail.description: Additional Information provided to add context

accountId.description: Additional Information provided to add context

addressDetails.description: Holds unstructured address information, e.g. Contact Person. Building, Floor, Apartment, Street Number, Street Name, Town, Area, Code

street.description: The first line of Customer's base address

postCode.description: Identifies the postal code for customer.

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

code.description: The identifier of the error message

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: The customer identifier where the beneficiary is a customer of the bank

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

beneficiaryNickName.description: The nick name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryCustomerNickName.description: The nick name assigned to a benefeciary by the customer

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Determines who will be responsible for charges.

companyName.description: The name that is displayed for the company

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

customerReference.description: The reference quoted by customer of the ordering account in a payment that is to be communicated to the beneficiary when a payment takes place

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

paymentCurrencyId.description: The identifier of the payment currency

preferredPaymentAmount.description: The payment amount to be populated in the FT (Fund Transfer) or Payment Order when the Beneficiary will be used is displayed in this field

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

groups.description: Carrier to be used for sending messages.
Carrier to be used for sending messages.
Carrier to be used for sending messages.

opportunityDisplayName.description: The name that is displayed for the oppportunity, opportunityName

productGroupId.description: The identifier of the product group

productLineId.description: The identifier of the product line

description.description: The name used for display purposes

imageType.description: Identifies the type of image to be stored and its location. Typical usage would be to segregate images by criteria such as PASSPORTS, PHOTOGRAPHS, SIGNATURES and DOCUMENTS. Image types can be used to assist selection of records in Enquiries as well as the physical distribution of files.Must be a valid record on IM.IMAGE.TYPE.

imageApplication.description: This field is used to link an image to a T24 application or file.

companyMnemonic.description: Shortened identiifier for a company. 3 alphanumer characters, e.g. BNK, BN1, BN2

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

imagePath.description: Identifies the image stored on the file system.

description.description: The name used for display purposes

imageType.description: Identifies the type of image to be stored and its location. Typical usage would be to segregate images by criteria such as PASSPORTS, PHOTOGRAPHS, SIGNATURES and DOCUMENTS. Image types can be used to assist selection of records in Enquiries as well as the physical distribution of files.Must be a valid record on IM.IMAGE.TYPE.

imageApplication.description: This field is used to link an image to a T24 application or file.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

imagePath.description: Identifies the image stored on the file system.

messageStatus.description: The status of a financial message

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

dateSent.description: Holds the date when the item was sent.

fromDepartmentId.description: The identifier of the originating department

fromDepartmentName.description: The display name of the originating department

parentMessageId.description: The identifier of the parent message.

toDepartmentId.description: The unique department identifier, to which the message is to be sent

uploadId.description: The unique ID of the uploaded file

uploadPath.description: The directory path to which the file is uploaded

nickName.description: The familiar form of a proper name.

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: The customer identifier where the beneficiary is a customer of the bank

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

linkBeneficiaryId.description: The identifier of the linked beneficiary

customerReference.description: The reference quoted by customer of the ordering account in a payment that is to be communicated to the beneficiary when a payment takes place

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

paymentCurrencyId.description: The identifier of the payment currency

preferredPaymentAmount.description: The payment amount to be populated in the FT (Fund Transfer) or Payment Order when the Beneficiary will be used is displayed in this field

ourCharges.description: Charge borne by the bank for providing a financial service

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

broker.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

brokerName.description: The name that is displayed for the broker

brokerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding for the broker

brokerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity of the instrument outstanding for the broker

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from securityMaster

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

tradeDate.description: The trade date of the contract

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

directDebitId.description: The identifier of the direct debit mandate. Format is 'D-accountId.sequenceNumber', e.g. D-123456.1

creditAccountId.description: The identifier of the credit account

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

direction.description: Specify the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received.The Claim can be 'Outward' ie. Claim is sent to the Customer's Bank or Inward Claim ie. other Bank submit their claim.Currently the Outward claim processing is supported through DD module & for Inward claim has to be handled through local interface.Mandatory field-Value allowed 'OUTWARD'

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

standaloneDdi.description: Defines whether the direct debit mandate is for stand-alone purpose

standaloneAmount.description: The amount of the stand-alone direct debit

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

currencyName.description: The name that is displayed for the currency

accountName.description: The name of the account that is displayed

displayNames.description: The name used for display purposes

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

accountWithBanks.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

orderType.description: Defines the order type of the transaction

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

counterPartyAccountId.description: The identifier of the counter party's account

currentFrequencyDate.description: Identifies the date component of field CURRENT.FREQUENCY- The Standing Order Application will execute the Standing Order instruction (i.e. the currency and amount specified in the two previous fields) according to the frequency specified in this field

currentEndDate.description: Identifies the Current End Date of the Standing Order for the Currency,

creditAccountId.description: The identifier of the credit account

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Determines who will be responsible for charges.

paymentOrderProductName.description: The name that is displayed for the paymentOrderProduct

alertRequestId.description: The identifier of the alert request

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

street.description: The first line of Customer's base address

addressDetails.description: Holds unstructured address information, e.g. Contact Person. Building, Floor, Apartment, Street Number, Street Name, Town, Area, Code

postCode.description: Identifies the postal code for customer.

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

phoneNumber.description: This field can contain the phone numbers of the customer.

smsNumber.description: The mobile telephone SMS number of the customer

status.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

customerMnemonic.description: Specifies an alternative easy means of referencing the Customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a legal entity

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the account officer

lastName.description: The last name of an individual
